mapper.select: select distinct to_char(inDate,'YYYY') as "statisticsYear" from intable where memNo = #{memNo} order by to_char(inDate,'YYYY') desc
select distinct to_char(exDate,'YYYY') as "statisticsYear" from extable where memNo = #{memNo} order by to_char(exDate,'YYYY') desc
select nvl(sum(inSum),0) from intable where memNo = #{memNo} and inDate between #{statisticsYear}||'-01-01' and #{statisticsYear}||'-12-31'
select nvl(sum(exSum),0) from extable where memNo = #{memNo} and exDate between #{statisticsYear}||'-01-01' and #{statisticsYear}||'-12-31'

select distinct to_char(inDate,'MM') as "statisticsMonthList" from intable where memNo = #{memNo} and inDate between #{statisticsYear}||'-01-01' and #{statisticsYear}||'-12-31' order by to_char(inDate,'MM') desc

select distinct to_char(exDate,'MM') as "statisticsMonthList" from extable where memNo = #{memNo} and exDate between #{statisticsYear}||'-01-01' and #{statisticsYear}||'-12-31' order by to_char(exDate,'MM') desc
